name: Cursed Weapon Castle
description:
Cursed Weapon Castle is an arena survival game where you must survive and fight the cursed weapons for as long as possible!

--------------------

Features: 

  • Intense combat
  • Interesting enemies
  • Original soundtrack by Sk0nk

--------------------

Controls:

WASD - Move

LMB / RMB - Attack (Dash)

--------------------

The theme: An end is only a beginning.

At first I had this elaborate plan for an interesting story but it got too complicated within the deadline. The combat system I had already made was super juicy and polished so I just decided to turn it into an arena survival game. So how does it have to do with the theme? When you die, you can restart. Yeah. Uh. Not the BEST interpretation of the theme, but at least I finished the game on time and had fun doing so. Check out my page for more games!
